attributes.action: Improve Car parking at Medway Maritime Hospital
attributes.background: As a regular user of Medway Maritime Hospital Car Park myself and other drivers wait up to an hour for a parking space causing many to miss appointments, roads are then blocked for Ambulances trying to get to emergencies ... please reorganise the Car Parks to reduce congestion to the Hospital

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the hospital and local NHS bodies, not the UK Government or Parliament.
